edge: Father-son relationship between Shahid Khan and Sardar Khan
Son relationship between Sardar Khan and Faizal Khan
First wife of Sardar Khan named Nagma Khatoon
Sworn uncle and servant relationship between Nasir and Shahid Khan
Second wife of Sardar Khan named Durga
Spouse relationship between Faizal Khan and Mohsina Hamid
Son relationship between Sardar Khan and Definite Khan from Durga
Eldest son named Danish Khan of Sardar Khan
Son relationship between Ramadhir Singh and J. P. Singh

Pankaj Tripathi as Sultan Qureshi, nephew of Sultana Daku, one of Sardar's enemies.
Pramod Pathak as Sultana Daku / Badoor Qureshi
Anurita Jha as Shama Parveen, Danish's wife and Sultan's sister.
Vipin Sharma as Ehsan Qureshi, Sultan's uncle
Aditya Kumar as Babu 'Babua' Khan ('Perpendicular'), Sardar's youngest son
Yashpal Sharma as Occasional Singer (Guest Appearance)
Vicky Kaushal as silhouette bystander (Cameo Role)
Satyakam Anand as J. P. Singh, Ramadhir's son
Sanjay Singh as Fazlu, Faisal's friend
